reviewText: After falling in love with this series, it stopped coming on television. On a whim I did a search on Amazon, and found the dvd sets here. Great program, well worth checking out.
This TV series is terrific!  Always keeps you guessing.  The plot for each show is so, so smart. I've shared the disks with my staff.... now they're Hustle Nuts!
I love this show! It's always brilliant. Great writers and cinematographers and characters, of course.
